content: WRONG. There is no anti-semitism. The American people know this and recognize this is a HOAX perpetrated by Jews. Lets see, in the last couple weeks Juan Thompson — HOAX JCC -HOAX Arizona — HOAX http://www.timesofisrael.com/four-arrested-for-turning-menorah-into-swastika/ New York -HOAX http://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/jewish-man-andrew-king-spray-paint-swastikas-new-york-schenectady-nazi-own-home-a7643996.html Most likely, the cemetaries and synogogues vandalism was also all HOAXES. Unless proven otherwise, any “anti-semitic” vandalizm is presumed to be done by a Jew or a rabble-rouser.
